issue.title: [Packaging][deb][RPM] Can't build repository packages for RC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7694](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7694). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
apache-arrow-archive-keyring failure:

https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=5737&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=5b4cc83a-7bb0-5664-5bb1-588f7e4dc05b&l=13284

```

2020-01-27T16:02:31.2221451Z /host/build.sh: 27: cd: can't cd to apache-arrow-archive-keyring-0.16.0/
```

apache-arrow-release failure:

https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=5774&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=5b4cc83a-7bb0-5664-5bb1-588f7e4dc05b&l=10330

```

/var/tmp/rpm-tmp.IfEC8a: line 39: cd: apache-arrow-release-0.16.0: No such file or directory
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7694?focusedCommentId=17024722) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6296
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6296>
